A video published by Channel 4 on Decemb: 2019, showed Boris Johnson speaking to a crowd in Derbyshire, England.
Channel 4: s subtitles of the video indicated that Johnson said, "I'm in favour of having people of colour come to this country, but I think we should have it democratically controlled."
An international fact: checking project, CrossCheckUK, found a better quality version of the video where Johnson clearly said "people of talent" instead of "people of colour."
